sentence.Network_en: Hegelian idealists subscribe to a general doctrine about the internality of relations.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑格尔唯心主义者赞同这种关于关系的内在性的一般学说.

sentence.Network_en: Comprehending Hegelian theory of tragedy must join together his philosophy thought.
sentence.Network_cn: 理解黑格尔悲剧理论必须结合他的哲学思想.

sentence.Network_en: On the other hand, in the inmost recess of consciousness, Hu Feng resisted the Hegelian philosophy.
sentence.Network_cn: 另一方面, 在意识深处, 胡风对黑格尔式的哲学方式是予以“反抗”的.
